DOC.brief_summary: A prospective , comparative , randomise study compare effect ulcer heal AQUACEL® Ag dress use 4 week follow treatment AQUACEL® 4 week Urgotul® Silver dressing follow Urgotul® 4 week subject venous leg ulcer .
DOC.brief_title: AQUACEL® Ag Dressing Urgotul® Silver Dressing Healing Chronic Venous Leg Ulcers
DOC.criteria: Subjects 18 year , willing able provide write informed consent . Subjects ankle brachial pressure index ( ABPI ) 0.8 great . Subjects venous leg ulcer ( i.e . CEAP classification C6 ) , duration le 24 month size range 5 cm240 cm2 . Subjects ' leg ulcer meet least 3 5 follow clinical sign : pain 2 dressing change , perilesional skin erythema , oedema , foul odour , heavy exudation . Subjects agree wear compression therapy daily combination trial dress . Subjects history skin sensitivity component study product . Subjects current local systemic antibiotic week prior inclusion . Subjects whose leg ulcer clinically infect erysipelas , malignant , recent deep venous thrombosis venous surgery within last 3 month . Subjects progressive neoplastic lesion treat radiotherapy chemotherapy , ongoing treatment immunosuppressive agent high dose corticosteroid . Subjects participate clinical study within past 3 month . Subjects pregnant breastfeeding ( accordance Urgotul® Silver package insert ) .
